result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Larry Pruden

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

08:48 AM Defendant Jamar Shawn Pierre Heywood in court by phone with attorney Larry R Pruden by video.  Mary Elizabeth Bricco appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel stipulate to report of Dr. Jackson.  Court finds defendant does not lack substantial mental capacity to understand the proceedings and assist in his own defense.  Preliminary hearing requested.  Time limits waived.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on March 22, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Activity: Initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:05 PM and recalled at 3:26 PM Defendant Jamar Shawn Pierre Heywood in court in custody at the Rock County Jail by video with attorney Kelly James Mattingly by video. Kyle Edward Johnson and Intern Margaret Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond set of $500.00 with conditions. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 9, 2022 at 1:15 PM to follow other matters previously scheduled. May argue bond at next hearing.
